page.name: Distant Relics
page.description: <no description available>

page.name: Helm of Old Aulore
page.description: This gleaming helm was once worn into war by a fierce warrior in a distant land... How it found its way here is unknown. (Cosmetic)

properties.name: Helm of Old Aulore
properties.description: This gleaming helm was once worn into war by a fierce warrior in a distant land... How it found its way here is unknown. (Cosmetic)

page.name: Tri-Form Flux
page.description: Wielded by a stranger roaming the elemental wastes, this multi-functional weapon seems capable of seamlessly transitioning between a blade, a partisan, and a blaster. (Cosmetic, Click to change forms)

properties.name: Tri-Form Flux

page.name: Draconic Brightspark I
page.description: A legendary blade from a far-off time. The handle seems to fit your hand perfectly somehow. Has a color custom glow!

page.name: Lost Starsword of Destiny
page.description:
It's unknown from where or when this mysterious magical weapon originated, but it radiates warmly with the power of Light all the same.
Special: DoT on Hit
(Cosmetic item. Provides no combat stats.)
